maxairesources.cleaning package

Submodules

maxairesources.cleaning.NoiseRemoval module

class maxairesources.cleaning.NoiseRemoval.NoiseRemoval(df, columns, path='')[source]

Bases: object

convert_timeformat()[source]

convert_timeformat: method is used to convert the timeformat to UTC for all date columns from the dataset

input : Dataframe, Date Column list Approach : Return : Processed Dataframe with all date columns of type timestamp in UTC format

determine_outlier_thersholds_std(col_name)[source]
determine_outlier_thresholds_iqr(column)[source]
drop_duplicates()[source]

drop_duplicates: method is used to drop duplicates rows from the dataset

input : Dataframe Approach : Return : Processed Dataframe with no duplicate rows.

impute_null()[source]

impute_null: method is used to remove the null values from the dataset

input : Dataframe, Numerical Column list Approach : We are reading the config file generated from the datacheck module and based on the null percentages and skewness of the featues, we are imputing null values. Skewness type : Symmetrical, Imputation Method - Mean Skewness type : Asymmetrical, Imputation Method - Median Return : Processed Dataframe free from Null Values

outlier_detect(column, method='iqr')[source]
read_config()[source]
remove_outlier()[source]

remove_outlier: method is used to remove the outliers from the dataset

input : Dataframe, Numerical Column list Approach : We are reading the config file generated from the datacheck module and based on the outlier percentages and skewness of the featues, we are capping outliers based on IQR Range or Standard Deviation Method return : Return the processed dataframe which is free from outliers
